content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #219

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 13

Submitted by @bvdh from Philips Healthcare

Chapter: CDS Services
Section: Calling a CDS Service - http request
Type: <not set>
In Person Requested? Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Proposed Wording:

An EHR SHALL call a CDS service by POSTING a JSON document to the service endpoint, which can be constructed from the CDS Service base URL and an individual service id as {baseUrl}/cds-services/{service.id}. The CDS Hook call SHALL include a JSON POST body with the following input fields:

Comment:
Add mandatory text.

## Triage Information

Triage Notes:
Reviewed with Bas

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive
Proposed Disposition Comment:
Agreed, mandatory language will be included

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot edited Issue #219

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #219

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Block Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-05-30_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

Julia Skapik moved the following disposition, seconded by @brynrhodes.

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment:
Agreed, mandatory language will be included

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
